name: Ext_R3_MedicationAdministration_reasonReference
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.MedicationAdministration.reasonReference for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationAdministration.reasonReference from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationAdministration|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Condition or Observation that supports why the medication was administered
element.definition: Condition or observation that supports why the medication was administered.
element.comment: `MedicationAdministration.reasonReference` maps to R5 `MedicationAdministration.reason`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
